title: Why does my boards say im lvl 4 when i just hit 30?
body: I wanna post is it common?

replies.body: It can take a moment for your account to sync to the boards.  The [syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)can help refresh things as well.
